long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the Blizzy.app chrome extension you can quickly create LinkedIn connection requests. 

Simply:

1. Visit the page of the person you'd like to connect with.
2. Hit the "generate" button in Blizzy.
3. Copy-paste the generated text to LinkedIn messaging or Sales Navigator.
